items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory. Not really intended as a consumer facing application, it's intended as a separate deployment to serverless providers that don't have dedicated file management built-in.
items.title: zacheryvaughn/network-volume-manager: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory. Not really intended as a consumer facing application, it's intended as a separate deployment to serverless providers that don't have dedicated file management built-in.

items.content_html: A lightweight CLI tool for generating project structures from JSON/YAML templates.
items.title: Shiro-cha/origami-generator: A lightweight CLI tool for generating project structures from JSON/YAML templates.

items.content_html: A lightweight, custom implementation of a Redis-like server built from scratch using Node.js. This server supports a subset of Redis commands and features, providing a simple yet powerful in-memory key-value store with additional functionality like transactions, expiry, multiple execution and persistence.
items.title: Sadaf2005/ReCache: A lightweight, custom implementation of a Redis-like server built from scratch using Node.js. This server supports a subset of Redis commands and features, providing a simple yet powerful in-memory key-value store with additional functionality like transactions, expiry, multiple execution  and persistence.

items.content_html: A lightweight (~3kb gzipped), zero-dependency UI control that transforms <select> or <input> elements into interactive hierarchical trees with checkboxes.
items.title: wesleydebruijn/tree-select: A lightweight (~3kb gzipped), zero-dependency UI control that transforms <select> or <input> elements into interactive hierarchical trees with checkboxes.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
items.title: AR10Dev/DragBoard: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.

items.content_html: Lightweight coding agent that runs in your terminal
items.title: openai/codex: Lightweight coding agent that runs in your terminal

items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible JSON-based database designed for simplicity and performance. FlexiDB supports in-memory caching, asynchronous operations, customizable data storage, automatic backups, and atomic transactions.
items.title: TariQ-2/FlexiDB: A lightweight, flexible JSON-based database designed for simplicity and performance. FlexiDB supports in-memory caching, asynchronous operations, customizable data storage, automatic backups, and atomic transactions.

items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible HTTP/WebSocket API module that implements the interface API of antelopejs.
items.title: AntelopeJS/api: A lightweight, flexible HTTP/WebSocket API module that implements the interface API of antelopejs.

items.title: kozmof/react-hook-quill:  A lightweight wrapper for Quill

items.content_html: temu-v0 is a lightweight framework designed for rapid application development. It simplifies the process of building scalable web applications with a focus on user-friendly interfaces and efficient performance.
items.title: fernandorodrigo/temu-v0: temu-v0 is a lightweight framework designed for rapid application development. It simplifies the process of building scalable web applications with a focus on user-friendly interfaces and efficient performance.

items.content_html: A lightweight debt tracker for managing shared expenses between friends.
items.title: CSC105-2024/G16-DebtMate: A lightweight debt tracker for managing shared expenses between friends.

items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
items.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Frontend: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: Open Source digital loyalty program and lightweight CRM platform for PyMEs/SMEs. Features points, tiers, rewards, QR validation, and customer management. Built with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL.
items.title: R3v180/LoyalPyME: Open Source digital loyalty program and lightweight CRM platform for PyMEs/SMEs. Features points, tiers, rewards, QR validation, and customer management. Built with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
